name: ATRAYUDH FOUNDATION

address: Shantinagar, Ward 14, Near Upal Mukhar Ground

briefDescription: AtrayudhFoundation is a parent-initiated non-profit organization, established on 01.08.2016, for persons with disabilities. N.I.D.E. ( National Institute of Developmental Education), operating since 01.12.2017 is our endeavour to educate & train children with Autism, Cerebral Palsy, Intellectual Disability & Multiple Disabilities by utilising maximum individual potential to lead an independent and meaningful life with dignity. Training parents & other stakeholders through workshops are a regular part of our activity. Occupational Therapy assessments are regularly done and stakeholders are guided and supported for home-based therapy management at present. We also provide functional & educational assessments for measurable developments to take place. Organising awareness camps for the prevention and management of various disabilities and providing community support is what we do as part of our activities. All our approaches are rights-based and advocate genuine inclusion for persons with disabilities based on principles of equality, fraternity & secularism.
